<title level="1" right="Trait">[Sentient](/Traits.aspx?ID=286)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 254</row>

Planes with this trait can change their physical nature according to the plane’s own whim.
name: Sentient
